official_title: To allow borrowers consolidating student loans to choose a variable or fixed interest rate, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 (HEA) to allow borrowers consolidating student loans to choose: (1) a variable or fixed interest rate; and (2) the loan consolidator. Provides for the Federal Government's recapture of excess interest charged by lenders, under HEA provisions for special allowances for lenders of student loans.

titles.title: To allow borrowers consolidating student loans to choose a variable or fixed interest rate, and for other purposes.
